title: Tin Foil Hat Ep 27: The Black Sun with Steve Lee
description:
Welcome to another insanely bizarre and interesting episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. On this episode, Ryan and Sam, welcome from Mangchi and the Steebee Weebee show, Steve Lee! On this episode we discuss....
1) Terrance McKenna and the importance of keeping an open mind
2)The Black Sun
3) Ancient Egypt
4) Jesus and Lucifer
5) The Divine Feminine
6) The Nazis
7) We read your iTunes reviews
Huge thank you to Detective 47 for making an awesome opening sound for this episode! You rock my friend!
Thank you to our new sponsor, The DREAM Donut Truck! Follow them on twitter at @DreamDonutTruck
and another HUGE thank you to all of your for all for listening for all of you support!!
